title: I love their tunes, but how do I find bhajan babas on youtube?
selftext:
So, many times in India at melas and so on I saw these type of babas around.  I don’t understand many of their words at all, but I love the tunes.  Searching on youtube I only find Sai Baba & etc others that I DON’T want to find lol.  Please can anybody tell me how to find bhajan baba music?   Tia, an Aussie.

https://preview.redd.it/py8h1shgzkfa1.jpg?width=1300&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=b6b7342e7d489ff8c7c89d5a46c5c77937d939b5
comments: I searched for "santo ke bhajan kirtan" and got some similar results. You can try doing the same.
